body_html:
Here is the current breakdown of test failures. The good news is that the vast majority of tests are passing. Curiously, there are some additional test failures when the we are configuring using CUDA_VERSION=7.5 than when the autoconf is configured to use the system default cuda version (i.e. the non-versioned files), and some of these appear to be missing dependency declarations errors. I am still investigating these.

Without CUDA_VERSION=7.5 set

Bazel invocation:

bazel fetch //...
bazel test --config=cuda //tensorflow/...

6 / 624 tests failing:

//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:beta_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:dirichlet_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:gamma_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:inverse_gamma_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:mvn_test
//tensorflow/examples/skflow:examples_test

With CUDA_VERSION=7.5 set

Bazel invocation:

CUDA_VERSION=7.5 bazel fetch //...
bazel test --config=cuda //tensorflow/...

13 / 624 tests failing:

//tensorflow/core:debug_debug_gateway_test (TIMEOUT)
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:beta_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:dirichlet_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:gamma_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:inverse_gamma_test
//tensorflow/contrib/distributions:mvn_test
//tensorflow/core:common_runtime_gpu_gpu_bfc_allocator_test
//tensorflow/core:common_runtime_gpu_gpu_debug_allocator_test
//tensorflow/core:common_runtime_gpu_gpu_event_mgr_test
//tensorflow/core:common_runtime_gpu_gpu_tracer_test
//tensorflow/core:common_runtime_gpu_pool_allocator_test
//tensorflow/examples/skflow:examples_test
//tensorflow/g3doc/how_tos/adding_an_op:cuda_op_test
